definitions.text: the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on
examples: he deserves a good kick in the butt
are you going to sit on your fanny and do nothing?

definitions.text: having the lower score or lagging position in a contest
examples: the 8th inning found the home team trailing

definitions.text: in or to or toward the rear
examples: seen from behind, the house is more imposing than it is from the front
the final runners were far behind

definitions.text: remaining in a place or condition that has been left or departed from
examples: when he died he left much unfinished work behind
the children left their books behind
he took off with a squeal of tires and left the other cars far behind
the clock is almost an hour slow

definitions.text: in or into an inferior position
examples: their business was lagging behind in the competition for customers
he fell behind with his mortgage payments
a month behind in the rent
a company that has been run behindhand for years
in arrears with their utility bills
